string.text:
A pump-action shotgun designed for military and law enforcement use, featuring a heavy-walled barrel and enhanced durability for extreme conditions. Its ergonomic design and ability to handle various ammunition types make it a versatile and dependable choice for close-quarters combat. With a reputation for reliability and rugged construction, it remains a staple in tactical and defensive applications.

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]O.F. Mossberg & Sons

A pump-action shotgun designed for military and law enforcement use, featuring a heavy-walled barrel and enhanced durability for extreme conditions. Its ergonomic design and ability to handle various ammunition types make it a versatile and dependable choice for close-quarters combat. With a reputation for reliability and rugged construction, it remains a staple in tactical and defensive applications.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]O.F. Mossberg & Sons

The Mossberg 590A1 is a hammerless pump-action shotgun designed by Carl Benson. Modified due to Navy requests, this improved model has an aluminum trigger guard and safety, a heavier barrel, and a bayonet lug. Intended for use under extreme conditions, this weapon became the standard shotgun in the United States military. The "Retrograde" combines modern performance with vintage walnut furniture, remaining a highly effective choice for home defense, combat, and collectors.
